verses.name: Deuteronomy 7:18
verses.text: Thou shalt not be afraid of them: but shalt well remember what the Lord thy God did unto Pharaoh, and unto all Egypt;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 7:19
verses.text: The great temptations which thine eyes saw, and the signs, and the wonders, and the mighty hand, and the stretched out arm, whereby the Lord thy God brought thee out: so shall the Lord thy God do unto all the people of whom thou art afraid.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 7:20
verses.text: Moreover the Lord thy God will send the hornet among them, until they that are left, and hide themselves from thee, be destroyed.
